What is the Arazzo Specification?

Outline (What is the Arazzo Specification?)

  1. What is the Arazzo Specification? [2]
  2. Arazzo Specification Structure [22]
  3. Exercise: A Pet Adoptions Workflow [4]
What is the Arazzo Specification? Frank Kilcommins: AI-Friendly API Workflows with Arazzo

(3) What is the Arazzo Specification?

  • The Arazzo Specification is a community-driven open specification within the OpenAPI Initiative, a Linux Foundation Project
  • Arazzo describes an approach to document use-case oriented workflows in a programmatically readable format
  • A workflow is a series of API calls which when woven together accomplish a specific task or goal or business objective
  • The human-readable nature improves the ability of API specifications to tell the story of the API(s) in a manner that can improve the consuming developer experience.
  • The machine-readable nature allows for intent orientated workflows to be discoverable and executable by AI agents, testing tools, documentation tools, and so on!


What is the Arazzo Specification? Frank Kilcommins: AI-Friendly API Workflows with Arazzo

(4) Dominant Use Cases

  • Deterministic recipes for the use of APIs
    • Make sense of large unwieldy API description
    • Bridge the gap where business flows span more than one API description
  • Living API documentation and improved consumer developer experience (DX)
  • Assertable business value (machine readable end-to-end test semantics)
  • Targeted code generation tooling (think SDKs, MCP Servers) for APIs driven by use cases
  • Improved regulatory checks via assertable workflows
  • The AI potential for value orientated repeatable interaction with APIs

Exercise: A Pet Adoptions Workflow

Outline (Exercise: A Pet Adoptions Workflow)

  1. What is the Arazzo Specification? [2]
  2. Arazzo Specification Structure [22]
  3. Exercise: A Pet Adoptions Workflow [4]
Exercise: A Pet Adoptions Workflow Frank Kilcommins: AI-Friendly API Workflows with Arazzo

(29) Demo Exercise

  • Assume we're working for a company called PetCo
  • Our problem: We`re overwhelmed by the number of pets being abandoned at our pet store
  • Proposed Solution: Create a Pet Adoptions Service
    • Following research and evaluation, we`ve decided to create the ability to search for and adopt pets that we catalog
    • We`ll offer the service via our website but also with a wider eco-system of shelters, charities, and pet orphanages


Exercise: A Pet Adoptions Workflow Frank Kilcommins: AI-Friendly API Workflows with Arazzo

(30) Example Workflow Use Case

  • Adopt a pet matching criteria
  • Steps
    • Search for a pet
    • Initiate adoption request
    • Confirm adoption by updating pet status
    • Verify pet has been marked as adopted in the listing


Exercise: A Pet Adoptions Workflow Frank Kilcommins: AI-Friendly API Workflows with Arazzo
